div.p: Due to a clerical error, the element Chris Sells originally spec'ed as wfw:commentRss appeared as wfw:commentRSS (note the difference in case) on Joe Gregorio's site. At least one product (WordPress) has implemented and deployed feeds using the spelling originally present on Joe's site.
Since that time, Joe has corrected his error. Accordingly:

ul.li: All consumers are encouraged to accept both spellings.
All producers are encouraged to adopt the original spelling
